channel.title: What hardware does Axoloti come with?
channel.description: Does the core include a power cord? And any other accessories? I wanna get all of these things lined up so I can start using it right away.

Thanks! I might just hijack the one from my phone! I can't wait to get started and show you guys what I have in store. Also I'm gonna need a lot of help

item.title: What hardware does Axoloti come with?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

It can be USB powered or powered thru a DC jack.
( specs in the user guide section of forum)

I'd highly recommend a sd card , it's almost a requirement

Read full topic

item.title: What hardware does Axoloti come with?
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

It's simply a board.

The strict minimum is such a USB / micro USB cord and a headphone.

You can connect it to a MIDI controller or keyboard though a MIDI cord or USB.

You can add a microSD card.

The output and inputs are stereo 1/4" stereo cords. You may need some "insert cables" to convert these to pairs of mono jacks.

Read full topic
